title: General questions when boarding a bus
context: Ask the bus driver if this vehicle goes to a specific destination.

content.bestLine: Does this bus go to downtown?

neutral.text: Is this bus headed to the city center?
Does this bus stop at the airport?
Will this bus take me to the train station?
Is this the bus to the beach?
Does this bus go to the university?
Can I take this bus to get to the mall?
Is downtown the final destination of this bus?
Will this bus pass by the hospital?

informal.text: Hey, does this bus go to downtown?
Is this the one that goes to the city?
Do you go to the airport?
Can you take me to the beach?
Does this bus stop at the university?
Is this bus going to the mall?
Will you pass by the train station?
Is this the right bus for the hospital?

formal.text: Excuse me, does this bus travel to downtown?
I would like to know if this bus goes to the city center.
Could you please tell me if this bus stops at the airport?
I am trying to get to the university, does this bus go there?
Is this bus scheduled to stop at the train station?
I need to go to the mall, does this bus go in that direction?

dialogs.description: Asking the bus driver about the destination

lines.speaker: Passenger
lines.text: Excuse me, does this bus go to downtown?

lines.speaker: Bus Driver
lines.text: Yes, this bus goes to downtown. It's the final destination.

lines.speaker: Passenger
lines.text: Does this bus stop at the university?

lines.speaker: Bus Driver
lines.text: Yes, we have a stop at the university. It's about 10 minutes from here.
